questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Bicycles and urban settings

A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) In an urban area
D) Inside a museum

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A busy street market
C) A quiet urban street
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A large tree
B) A tricycle
C) A street vendor
D) A playground

B) A tricycle
C) A fountain
D) A car

B) A beach
C) Buildings, trees and tables, chairs
D) A forest

B) A bicycle rack

D) Yellow
